mapper.select: select * from chatroom where auction_no = #{auctionNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (chatroom_no, auction_no, member_no) values (#{chatRoomNo}, #{auctionNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: select A.chatroom_no, A.auction_no, B.auctioneer_no, B.auction_title, C.member_nick auctioneer_nick, C.attachment_no auctioneer_attachment_no, E.member_nick, E.attachment_no, min(D.photo_no) photo_attachment_no from chatroom A join auction B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no join member C on B.auctioneer_no = C. member_no join photo D on A.auction_no = D.photo_auction_no join member E on A.member_no = E.member_no where A.member_no = #{memberNo} or B.auctioneer_no = #{memberNo} group by A.chatroom_no, A.auction_no, B.auctioneer_no, B.auction_title, C.member_nick, C.attachment_no, E.member_nick, E.attachment_no order by A.chatroom_no desc
